product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Recommended age group
product.description: Identifies the suitable age range for a product, typically toys and games; e.g. babies, teens

product.name: Toy/Game material
product.description: Identifies the main material used in a toy or game, such as plastic or wood

product.name: Sleeve length type
product.description: Specifies the style of sleeves on clothing items, such as short or sleeveless

product.name: Size
product.description: Used to specify the size of a product, such as 0-3 months or Extra large (XL)

product.name: Genre
product.description: Classifies the category or style of media, such as horror or fantasy

product.name: Fit
product.description: Describes the fit of a garment, typically pant shape; e.g. skinny leg, wide

product.name: Waist rise
product.description: Indicates where on the waist a garment sits, like low, medium or high

product.name: Pants length type
product.description: Used to defines the length of pants, such as cropped or long

product.name: Fabric
product.description: Identifies the type of fabric used in a product, for example, cotton or denim

product.name: Neckline
product.description: Used to describe the neck shape of a garment, such as V-neck or boat
